item.title: 对冲基金和加密货币吸引海湾继承人继承 1 万亿美元遗产
item.description: 2020 年，一个拥有 135 年历史的海湾商人家族的两个年轻兄弟向家族中的一位资金管理人提出了一个想法：在比特币上下注。【原文：In 2020, two young brothers at a 135-year-old Gulf merchant family approached one of its money-managers with an idea: bet on Bitcoin.】

item.title: B&M 盈利预警后暴跌，新任首席执行官公布改革计划
item.description: B&M European Value Retail SA 在这家英国折扣零售商发布利润预警并表示可能需要长达 18 个月的时间来修复公司的所有 "运营弱点 "后暴跌。【原文：B&M European Value Retail SA plummeted after the UK discount retailer warned on profit and said it may take as long as 18 months to fix all the company’s “operational weaknesses.”】

item.title: 西班牙电信公司在首席执行官的审查下寻求更精简、更大胆的结构
item.description: Telefonica SA 董事长正在进行的战略审查将于下个月提交，其目标是启动西班牙电信运营商的增长。【原文：An executive shake-up, potential job cuts and a pledge to do more deals all offer glimpses into the Telefonica SA chairman’s ongoing strategic review, set to be presented next month with the ambition of kick starting growth at the Spanish carrier.】

item.title: 降息预期减弱，马来西亚债券流出量创 11 个月新高
item.description: 受降息预期减弱和债券到期潮的影响，马来西亚债券出现了 11 个月来最大的外资流出。【原文：Malaysian bonds posted their largest foreign outflows in 11 months, weighed down by fading expectations of interest-rate cuts and a wall of maturities.】

item.title: 帝国集团计划回购 14.5 亿英镑，新任首席执行官上任
item.description: 帝国品牌公司（Imperial Brands Plc）计划回购 14.5 亿英镑（19 亿美元）股票，并表示有望实现全年目标。【原文：Imperial Brands Plc plans a £1.45 billion ($1.9 billion) share buyback and said it is on track to meet its full-year targets.】

item.title: 安哥拉政府官员称安哥拉将继续出售欧洲债券
item.description: 安哥拉一位政府官员说，安哥拉将继续发行欧元债券，并将于周二晚些时候宣布出售事宜。【原文：Angola will proceed with a eurobond offering, with an announcement on the sale to be made later on Tuesday, a government official said.】

item.title: 泰国投入 14 亿美元刺激消费
item.description: 阿努廷-查维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）总理领导的政府已经批准了一项价值 13.6 亿美元的消费刺激计划，以在大选前提振疲软的经济和政府的声望。【原文：Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s government has green-lit a $1.36 billion consumption stimulus program to boost a weakening economy and its popularity ahead of a general election.】

item.title: 陷入困境的印尼航空公司将向国家基金申请 14 亿美元资金
item.description: 印尼鹰航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）预计将从国家主权财富基金筹集多达 14.4 亿美元的现金，以使这家陷入困境的国有航空公司在财务上站稳脚跟。【原文：PT Garuda Indonesia expects to raise as much as $1.44 billion in cash from the nation’s sovereign wealth fund to put the distressed state-owned carrier on firmer financial footing.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国房价自五月以来首次下跌
item.description: 据英国一家顶级抵押贷款机构称，9 月份英国房价从历史最高点回落，这表明对加税的担忧抑制了潜在购房者的需求。【原文：UK house prices fell from an all-time high in September, according to one of the country’s top mortgage lenders, suggesting fears of tax rises are dampening demand from prospective homebuyers.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单下降，挑战默茨的复苏之路
item.description: 德国工厂订单连续第四个月意外下降，这是政府在努力使欧洲最大经济体摆脱两年萎缩之际遭遇的又一挫折。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly fell for a fourth month, another setback to the government as it struggles to lift Europe’s biggest economy out of two years of contraction.】

item.title: 英国板球明星参与印度医疗旅游公司融资回合
item.description: 包括英格兰国家队队长本-斯托克斯（Ben Stokes）和快速投球手约弗拉-阿切尔（Jofra Archer）在内的板球明星参与了一家初创公司价值 450 万美元的种子轮融资，该公司致力于帮助英国人在印度获得医疗服务。【原文：Cricket stars including England’s Test captain Ben Stokes and fast bowler Jofra Archer were among participants in a $4.5 million seed funding round for a startup that helps people in the UK get medical treatment in India.】

item.title: 乌兹别克斯坦采取紧缩货币政策抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 乌兹别克斯坦中央银行推迟了实现通胀目标的日期，并计划继续收紧货币政策，目的是在经济强劲增长和监管变革的背景下控制物价。【原文：Uzbekistan’s central bank has pushed back the date for reaching its inflation target and plans to keep monetary policy tight, aiming to rein in prices amid robust growth and regulatory changes.】

item.title: 世界银行称非洲必须在 "Z世代 "的愤怒中促进就业
item.description: 到 2050 年，非洲的劳动力将几乎翻一番，非洲大陆迫切需要创造大规模的就业机会，以满足年轻人的需求。【原文：Africa’s labor force will almost double by 2050 and the continent urgently needs large-scale job creation to meet the demands of young people whose frustrations have already sparked Gen-Z protests.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔银行要求支持 BBVA 的投资者披露更多信息
item.description: 萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）要求西班牙证券市场监管机构要求某些接受 BBVA SA 168 亿欧元（197 亿美元）收购要约的投资者披露更多信息。【原文：Banco Sabadell SA is asking Spain’s securities market supervisor to demand extra disclosures from certain investors who accept BBVA SA’s €16.8 billion ($19.7 billion) offer to acquire it.】

item.title: 世界银行警告：亚洲青年难以找到好工作
item.description: 整个亚洲的年轻人都在努力寻找好工作，许多人只能从事低生产率的工作，世界银行警告说，这可能会给社会稳定带来压力，因为挫折感助长了全球青年领导的抗议浪潮。【原文：Young people across Asia are struggling to find good jobs, with many stuck in low-productivity work that the World Bank warns could strain social stability as frustrations fuel a global wave of youth-led protests.】

item.title: 世界银行因特朗普对印度征收关税而下调南亚展望
item.description: 世界银行将其对南亚经济增长的预测下调了近一个百分点，原因是美国对该地区最大经济体印度征收的惩罚性关税影响了经济前景。【原文：The World Bank cut its forecast for South Asia’s economic growth by nearly a percentage point, as punishing US tariffs on India — the region’s largest economy — weigh on the outlook.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望延续第二天跌势
高盛旗下 Verdalia 公司融资 6.71 亿欧元资助生物甲烷厂
item.description: 由高盛集团支持的生物甲烷公司 Verdalia Bioenergy 已从一个大型银行财团筹集到 6.71 亿欧元（7.85 亿美元）的债务，用于资助西班牙和意大利的项目。【原文：Verdalia Bioenergy, a biomethane firm backed by Goldman Sachs Group Inc., has raised €671 million ($785 million) of debt from a large banking consortium to fund projects across Spain and Italy.】

item.title: 里夫斯将从英国通胀困境中获得难得的预算支持
item.description: 在剩下不到两个月的时间里，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将从一个不太可能的方面获得帮助：通货膨胀。【原文：With less than two months left to finalize her plans for patching up the UK’s multi-billion-pound budgetary black hole, Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves is set to get help from an unlikely quarter: inflation.】

item.title: 爱尔兰将发布投资预算应对特朗普威胁
item.description: 爱尔兰政府将公布多年来最严厉的预算，以保护本国经济免受美国公司投资下降的威胁。【原文：The Irish government is to deliver its toughest budget in years in a bid to shield its economy from the threat of declining investment from US firms.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，埃隆-马斯克任命前摩根士丹利银行家为 xAI 首席财务官
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）任命摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）前高管担任 xAI 首席财务官，任命这位盟友帮助监管美国最大的人工智能初创公司之一。【原文：Elon Musk named a former Morgan Stanley executive the chief financial officer of xAI, the Financial Times reported, appointing an ally to help oversee one of the largest US artificial intelligence startups.】

item.title: 日本 30 年期国债销售需求低于 12 个月平均水平
item.description: 日本 30 年期国债拍卖的需求率高于 12 个月的平均水平，缓解了投资者对支持刺激政策的保守派人士佐奈隆一在执政党领导人竞选中意外胜出的担忧。【原文：Japan’s 30-year government bond auction drew a stronger demand ratio than its 12-month average, easing investor concerns following the surprise victory of pro-stimulus conservative Sanae Takaichi in the ruling party leadership race.】

item.title: 印尼盾防卫使印尼储备降至14个月最低点
item.description: 随着印尼央行加大力度捍卫不断走弱的印尼盾，印尼的外汇储备降至一年多来的最低点。【原文：Indonesia’s foreign-exchange reserves fell to the lowest in more than a year as the central bank stepped up its efforts to defend the weakening rupiah.】

item.title: 股票交易员关注 LG 印度、塔塔资本首次公开募股和 Nifty 指数突破
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 高市任命日本前财务大臣为自民党秘书长
item.description: 有望成为日本首位女首相的高市真奈任命前财务大臣铃木俊一为执政党新秘书长，这表明她的目标是平息人们对财政纪律的担忧。【原文：Sanae Takaichi, who is expected to be Japan’s first female prime minister, appointed former Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki as the ruling party’s new Secretary-General in a sign that she aims to quell concerns about fiscal discipline.】

item.title: 铜走高，关注美联储利率和美国停摆
item.description: 在美国政府关门之际，投资者关注美联储利率前景，铜价因此上涨。【原文：Copper rose as investors focused on the outlook for Federal Reserve interest rates amid a US government shutdown.】

item.title: LG 电子印度公司开始接受 13 亿美元首次公开募股订单
item.description: LG电子公司的印度分公司将开始接受13亿美元首次公开募股的订单，与塔塔资本有限公司（Tata Capital Ltd.）一起启动交易，这可能是印度新股上市创纪录的一个月。【原文：LG Electronics Inc.’s Indian unit is set to start taking orders for its $1.3 billion initial public offering, joining Tata Capital Ltd. to launch deals in what could be a record month for new listings in the country.】

item.title: 菲律宾通胀率保持在目标之下，为降息提供了空间
item.description: 菲律宾的通货膨胀在 9 月份有所加快，但仍低于中央银行的目标范围，这为货币当局在今年进一步降低基准利率提供了空间。【原文：Philippine inflation quickened in September but stayed below the central bank’s target range, giving monetary authorities space to reduce the benchmark interest rate further this year.】

item.title: 高市冲击市场后，日元套利交易重回视野
item.description: 由于佐佐江-高市几乎确定升任日本首相，加息步伐放缓的可能性增大，一度流行的押注日元的货币交易似乎将卷土重来。【原文：A once-popular currency trade betting against the yen looks set to make a comeback, as Sanae Takaichi’s near-certain elevation to Japan’s premiership raises the prospect of slower interest-rate hikes.】
